Articles.Content:
This challenge is considered simple and complex in many ways. Can you built a train in KSP? Scoring will be based on distance etc.

Guidelines:

Using STOCK parts, you must design a choo choo train.

It must be on rails, and move freely.

It has to carry 5 or more kerbals. The more kerbals it is capable of carrying the more points it will get. See the scoring system.

Can be any size

Rules:

Stock parts only

Must carry over 5 kerbals.

Has to travel AT LEAST 3600 meters (distance of runway from start to end to start.

Scoring system:

Accepting challenge - 10 point

Engines are overrated - 20 points

Steam train - 30 points

+ 1 kerbal = +1 point (7 kerbals = 2 points, 8 kerbals = 3 points etc.)

Working (safe) tracks - 50 points

Secret - [variable]
